name: Hotel New Otani Osaka
description: Located right in front of Osaka Castle, Hotel New Otani offers spacious rooms and 13 dining options. The property is a 5-minute walk from shopping complex JO-TERRACE OSAKA. Free WiFi connection is available throughout the property. Rooms feature large windows with city or Osaka Castle views. They have an LCD TV and comfortable beds. Guests can relax in the hot tub or sauna, or enjoy a massage treatment for an additional charge. Several shops and a beauty salon are available as well. The hotel offers concierge services, where entrance tickets to Osaka Castle can be purchased. Hotel New Otani Osaka offers a shuttle service to and from Kyoto. New Otani Osaka’s restaurants cater a variety of French, Japanese and International cuisine. Offering spectacular views of the city skyline and Osaka Castle, Keyaki restaurant serves grilled teppanyaki dishes, while Sky Lounge offers refreshing cocktails. A breakfast buffet featuring various cuisines are available at an extra charge. Osaka Station is a 10-minute train ride from Hotel New Otani, while Kyoto and Nara can also be reached within 1-hour by train. The hotel is about a 75-minute train ride from Kansai International Airport and a 1-hour train ride from Itami Airport.

name: Moxy Osaka Honmachi
description: Treat yourself to an unforgettable visit in a vibrant destination. Moxy Osaka Honmachi is an upscale lifestyle hotel in the buzzy downtown district of Osaka, near some of the country's most dynamic architecture, nightlife and dining. Stretch out in intelligently designed hotel accommodations with tech-forward features, 50-inch TVs, motion-activated LED lights, plush platform beds and furiously fast, free Wi-Fi. Satisfy your appetite with a snack from the grab-and-go deli, open 24 hours a day for early birds and night owls alike. Get to know downtown Osaka with ease; we offer easy access to Honmachi Station, as well as city attractions including Osaka Castle, Universal Studios Japan and Dotonbori. Tackle work projects in our library and socialize with friends in our hotel's inspiring communal areas. Punctuate a perfect day with creative cocktails and music at the Moxy Bar & Lounge. Whether you’re here for work or for fun, Moxy Osaka Honmachi is ready to make your stay special.Marriott

TERRACE & DINING ZERO restaurant serves an original buffet lunch and breakfast.

name: Moxy Osaka Shin Umeda
description: Designed for fun, Moxy Osaka Shin Umeda offers everything you need to work, play and relax. We’re only a five-minute walk from JR Fukushima station; enjoy easy access to key attractions such as Universal Studios Japan, Osaka Castle and more. Settle into our chic, cozy and dog-friendly lodging, filled with all the amenities you’d expect from a lifestyle hotel. Fun facilities include the Moxy Hotels brand’s signature Bar Moxy, with its outdoor terrace and bustling atmosphere, the quiet Library Zone to plug in and tune out, an exclusive 24-hour fitness center and furiously fast and free Wi-Fi for ultimate connectivity. Create, connect and energize in our stylish common areas. It’s all waiting for you here at Moxy Osaka Shin Umeda.Marriott

name: Apa Hotel Nambashinsaibashi-Nishi
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 197 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature hair dryers and slippers. Conveniences include blackout drapes/curtains and in-room massages, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a vending machine. Property Location With a stay at APA Hotel Nambashinsaibashi-Nishi in Osaka (Shinsaibashi), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Kyocera Dome Osaka and Osaka Castle. This hotel is 0.8 mi (1.2 km) from Orix Theater and 5.6 mi (8.9 km) from Universal Studios Japan. Dining Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A city tax may be collected at the property, effective January 1, 2017. The city tax ranges from JPY 100-300 per person, per night based on the nightly room rate. The tax does not apply to nightly rates under JPY 7,000. Please note that further exemptions may apply. The units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Toyoko Inn Osaka Hankyu Juso-eki Nishi-guchi No.2 have a river view. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Toyoko Inn Osaka Hankyu Juso-eki Nishi-guchi No.2 can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Each room is equipped with a work desk and an en suite bathroom with a bathtub. Free toiletries are provided. The hotel offers coin-operated laundry machines. The lobby has a shared computer and printing facilities. The hotel is a 5-minute drive from Dotonbori Shopping Street and an 8-minute walk from Shinsaibashi Subway Station. Roynet Hotel Yotsubashi Daiwa is a 10-minute drive from Tennoji Zoo and Kyocera Dome.

Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as flat screen television, slippers, towels, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary). The property offers various recreational opportunities. HOTEL MYSTAYS Midosuji Honmachi combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Osaka unforgettable.priceline.com

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. description: Set in a prime location of Osaka, Step Inn Shin-Osaka Higashiguchi puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, laundromat, taxi service, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage are just some of the facilities on offer. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with complimentary tea, towels, carpeting, slippers, television LCD/plasma screen. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Osaka, Step Inn Shin-Osaka Higashiguchi will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: The Singulari Hotel & Skyspa At Universal Studios Japan
description: The Singulari Hotel & Skyspa at UNIVERSAL STUDIOS JAPAN TM is an official affiliate of Universal Studios Japan (R). Directly connected to JR Universal City Station, guests can enjoy convenient access to Universal Studios Japan (R) and Osaka city centre. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. For guests' comfort, all rooms are equipped with Simmons mattresses. A clothes rack, sofa bed, electric kettle, hairdryer, toothbrush and slippers are provided. Some rooms have large windows featuring Osaka bay views. Dry cleaning service can be requested for an additional charge. The Skyspa which features an open-air bath and a sauna is located on the 14th floor and is free for all guests to view the Osaka waterfront. The on-site restaurant offers buffet breakfast for an additional cost. JR Osaka Station is a 12-minute train ride from the hotel, while Namba Station is a 35-minute train ride and walk away. The closest airport is Itami Airport which is 30 minutes drive away from the property.

name: Ana Crowne Plaza Hotel Osaka
description: Overlooking the Dojima River, 5 star ANA Crowne Plaza offers rooms with sweeping city views and free Wi-Fi. The hotel features a swimming pool and 6 food and beverage options. Rooms at the ANA Crowne Plaza Osaka are spacious, with comfortable colours and soft lighting. All include a minibar and a flat-screen TV. The hotel is a 3-minute walk from Oebashi Train Station. Osaka Castle and Dotonbori Shopping Street are a 15-minute taxi ride away. Guests can relax with a spa treatment or unwind in the sauna. All guests have access to the 24-hour fitness room for free. Sightseeing is easy with the concierge and tour desk. Nishi-Umeda Station on the Subway Tosubashi Line is a 7-minute stroll from the hotel. Kitashinchi Station on the JR Tozai Line is a 5-minute walk from ANA Crowne Plaza Osaka. Karin Chinese Restaurant offers modern Cantonese cuisine in an elegant setting. Japanese dishes are served at Tankuma Kitamise and Dojima Teppanyaki. A cafe and bar are available. The Delica Shop on site offers a selection of rich cakes and chocolates for guests to take out.

The property is situated 1.6 km from Dawn Center, 2.1 km from Horikawaebisu Shrine and 2 km from Nozaki Park. Taiyū-ji Temple is 2.2 km from the hotel and Creo Osaka East is 2.3 km away. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. Honden-ji Temple is 2.7 km from Toyoko Inn Osaka Kyobashi Sakuranomiya, while Seibi Park is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

The property is around 600 metres from Mitsutera Temple, 800 metres from Glico Man Sign and 600 metres from Shinsaibashi Shopping Arcade. The property is non-smoking and is set 200 metres from Hoan-ji Temple. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Popular points of interest near Hotel Replace Namba Osaka include Shimoyamatobashi Monument, Nipponbashi Monument and Zojugoi Yasuidoton Dobokukiko Monument. name: Courtyard by Marriott Shin-Osaka Station
description: Find everything you need to move forward at Courtyard Shin-Osaka Station. Conveniently located only steps from world-famous Shin-Osaka Train Station, our hotel allows for stress-free travel to Western Japan's notable cities and historic attractions. Osaka, Kobe, Kyoto, Nagoya are all easily accessible via train. Settle into your spacious, intelligently designed hotel room with amenities like a flat-screen TV, deluxe bedding, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, a mini-bar and a workspace. Guests can also reserve our premium Executive-level lodging for panoramic views of Osaka and free access to our sophisticated Lounge. Additional on-site resources include two exquisite restaurants, a welcoming bar, a 24-hour fitness center and modern, versatile venue space. Our hotel is a superb choice for those looking to host a business gathering or social event in the area. Japan is yours to explore from Courtyard Shin-Osaka Station.Marriott

name: The Park Front Hotel at Universal Studios Japan
description: The hotel features private parking, various cafes, restaurants and shops on site, as well as free WiFi access in all areas. Universal City Station is a 12-minute ride from JR Osaka Station via train, and a 20-minute ride from JR Shin-Osaka Station, where bullet train access is provided. The limousine bus service from Osaka International Airport to the property takes 45-minutes. From Kansai International Airport, the limousine bus will take 70-minutes. By car, it is around a 20-minute drive from Osaka via the Hanshin Express Way. The hotel features a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and massage services, and a coin laundry service is available at an extra cost on the 2nd floor. In addition, guests will find a café, a pancake shop, a pizza restaurant and a convenience store all within the property premises. All rooms are furnished with an air purifier/moisturizer and are air-conditioned with a flat-screen satellite TV, desk and seating area. The en suite bathroom features a private bath and shower. Free toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer is provided. Rooms are also soundproof and feature refrigerators as well as personal lockers. The on-site restaurant Buffet Dining Akala has a Hawaiian themed interior and serves a wide array of international cuisine, including Chinese, Western and Japanese dishes. The restaurant is available for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: Hotel Fine Garden Juso
description: Hotel Fine Garden Juso is located in Osaka, a 3-minute walk from Juso Train Station. This hotel features stylish rooms with a flat-screen TV and karaoke facilities. Free parking is provided and free Wi-Fi is available at the entire hotel. Elegant rooms come with high ceilings and warm lighting. Each well-appointed unit is equipped with a Nintendo Wii console and DVD player. A bathtub, bidet and toiletries are in the en suite bathroom. Rooms have erotic items and TV channels, and all rooms allow smoking. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist with travel and sightseeing arrangements. Juso Fine Garden Hotel is a 4-minute train ride from JR Osaka Station, and a 40-minute train ride from Kyoto area. Kobe and Takarazuka Stations can be reached within a 30-minute train ride.

With a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 300 metres from Manpuku-ji Temple, and within less than 1 km of the city centre. The units come with a fridge, microwave, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. Each room includes a safety deposit box and selected rooms will provide you with city views. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near MIMARU OSAKA NAMBA North include Mitsutera Temple, Kokoni Sunaba Ariki Monument and Shinsaibashi Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

description: Hotel Granvia Osaka is located directly above JR Osaka Train Station. It offers 8 dining options, easy transport links and comfortable rooms with city views and free WiFi access. Simple elegance defines the rooms at Osaka Granvia, all of which include a fridge and full private bathroom. Guests can enjoy watching satellite TV with a drink from the minibar. Shin-Osaka Shinkansen (Bullet Train) Station is a 5-minute train ride. Universal Studios Japan is a 10-minute train ride away, and the hotel sells tickets. Hankyu Department Store is a 5-minute walk away. Itami Airport is a 30-minute drive from the hotel, while Kansai International Airport is 60 minutes via express train. Osaka Hotel Granvia’s 24-hour front desk offers baggage storage and fax/photocopy services. Guests can relax with a massage or stretch out in the hotel’s spacious, impressive lobby. Skyline views can be enjoyed at Fleuve Restaurant, which offers French and Italian cuisines, and the stylish Sandbank Bar. Japanese specialities are served at Shizuku, Osaka Ukihashi and teppanyaki restaurant Kiryu. Many other dining options can be found at Daimaru Department Store, next door.

Both Abeno Harukas and Shinsaibashi area can be reached within a 20-minute subway ride. The 24-hour front desk at New Hotel Osaka provides luggage storage. "Check In Advance Service" which is available from 8 a.m. can help guests bring their luggage to the guest rooms so our guests can go to their rooms directly after their trip. BelleVue Restaurant offers a Chinese menu with 13th-story views of the city, while Adustam serves Cafe-Restaurant.

name: Fairfield by Marriott Osaka Namba
description: Fairfield by Marriott Osaka Namba offers a truly unique hotel experience. Located in Namba, the cultural and culinary center, our Osaka, Japan, hotel provides easy access to both local business districts and tourist attractions, including Universal Studios Japan. Kansai International Airport is roughly 40 minutes away and we're just 15 minutes from the Shin-Osaka train station, enabling you to travel around the country with ease. Our Osaka hotel warmly welcomes you with friendly service and stylish accommodations featuring complimentary Wi-Fi and other modern amenities. Our staff are happy to help you to enjoy Osaka to the fullest. Stop by our on-site restaurant for delicious dishes made from fresh ingredients, including vegetables from our chef’s farm. Reserve one of our two venues for your next event in Osaka, Japan, and take advantage of our modern audiovisual technology. Feel at home when you stay at Fairfield by Marriott Osaka Namba.Marriott

name: Hotel Wako
description: Hotel Wako offers small and simple Japanese rooms with air conditioning, a cable TV and shared bathrooms. Just 100 metres from Imaike Train Station, it has a public bath, 24-hour shared shower rooms, shared-use kitchen and a coin launderette. Free Wi-Fi is available. Rooms at Wako Hotel include a fridge and have a tatami (woven-straw) floor. Toilets are shared. Beds are Japanese-style futon bedding, which is thinner than a mattress and sits directly on the floor. Linens are changed only for guests staying more than 1 week, and towels are not provided. The hotel is 300 metres from Haginochaya Train Station and a 6-minute walk from Dobutsu-koen-mae Subway Station. It is a 35-minute train trip from Osaka Castle and Universal Studios Japan. You can hang out on the roof terrace, unwind with the coin-operated massager or check your email on the internet PC. The hotel’s shared kitchen includes a microwave and a toaster. This hotel does not have a restaurant.

description: Attractively located in the Shinsaibashi, Namba, Yotsubashi district of Osaka, R Hotel Namba is situated 100 metres from Nipponbashi Park, 200 metres from Nipponbashi Catholic Church and 200 metres from Shinko-ji Temple. The property is close to popular attractions like Saio-ji Temple, Komyo-ji Temple and Daiko-ji Temple. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms have free WiFi and wired internet, a private bathroom and a video-on-demand (VOD) system. Rooms at Shin-Osaka Sunny Stone Hotel include a fridge, an electric kettle with green tea and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom has a bathtub, shower and amenities. The hotel offers convenient access to the Midosuji Subway Line and Hankyu Train Line. It is a 3-minute walk to Exit 1 of Nishi-Nakajima-Minamikata Subway Station, which is 2 stops from Umeda Station and 1 stop from JR Shin-Osaka Shinkansen Station, and a 6-minute walk to Hankyu Minamikata Train Station. A free-use internet PC is available at the lobby. Sunny Restaurant serves Japanese and Western dishes for breakfast and lunch.

Intex Osaka is a 30-minute subway ride and walk from Hotel She Osaka, while Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan is a 25-minute walk and subway ride. Kansai International Airport is a 70-minute train ride away.

name: St. Regis Osaka
description: The St. Regis Osaka welcomes guests to the heart of beautiful Midosuji, the Champs Elysées of Osaka. Our five-star hotel is located near popular destinations such as Universal Studios Japan, Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan and the city's premium shopping districts. There is no better address to explore the city center and the neighboring cities of Kyoto and Nara, thanks to our hotel location near the train station. Return for exquisite dining at our on-site restaurants, Rue d'Or, La Veduta, and Teppanyaki WAJO, before discovering the epitome of luxury at the exclusive IRIDIUM featuring SOTHYS Spa. Retreat to our hotel’s iconic 12th-floor terrace with sweeping vistas of the Osaka skyline. Discover unforgettable ambiance and state-of-the-art amenities in five-star hotel accommodations. Our 160 luxury hotel rooms and suites feature spacious layouts and elegantly appointed decor. Every experience our hotel in Osaka, Japan, is enhanced with the St. Regis Butler Service, available any time, day or night.Marriott

name: Hotel Keihan Universal Tower
description: Featuring the 31st-floor S-PARK Spa with a sauna, jet bath and hot-spring baths with city views (admission fees not included with stay), Hotel Keihan Universal Tower is 300 metres from Universal Studios Japan. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property. Rooms at Hotel Keihan Universal Tower have a large window, neutral tones and wood highlights. All come with a 37-inch flat-screen TV. The attached bathroom includes a bath. Bath amenities including a toothbrush set, hairdryer and slippers are provided. The hotel offers a massage service. Currency exchange and luggage storage are available at the 24-hour reception. Top of Universal served in buffet style for dinner, overlooking the Osaka skyline from the 32nd floor. The hotel is a 70-minute ride from Kansai Airport by express Limousine Bus. Itami Airport is a 45-minute express bus ride. JR Osaka Train Station is a 15-minute train ride away.

name: Dotonbori Crystal Exe
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 146 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and washing machines. Amenities This hotel offers designated smoking areas. Property Location With a stay at Dotonbori Crystal Exe in Osaka (Shinsaibashi), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Osaka Castle and Kyocera Dome Osaka. This hotel is 0.6 mi (1 km) from Nipponbashi and 5.3 mi (8.6 km) from Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan.
