name: Holiday Inn Express Osaka City Centre - Midosuji
description: With direct access to Osaka's buzzing Midosuji district, Holiday Inn Express Osaka City Centre - Midosuji is as convenient as it gets. At this contemporary, lifestyle hotel, you'll enjoy authentic Japanese hospitality and world-class comforts. Breakfast lovers will rejoice! The hotel's popular free breakfast includes both Western and Japanese favorites. And, if you're in a hurry, the grab & go option will keep you satisfied until lunchtime. After a big day, grab a quick coffee or relax with a glass of wine and cheese in the Great Room. Plenty of seating options make this shared living space ideal for work and play. Bold accents and distinctive pops of color create a premium yet relaxed vibe. You'll be wowed by the brand's unique design philosophy that blends contemporary design and sophisticated Japanese styling. You'll stay connected with fast Wi-Fi, and when it's time to relax, you'll find a range pillow options, air purifier and black-out curtains help you sleep peacefully. With fluffy towels, high-quality Soak bathroom products, and a spa-like shower - the bathrooms are made for relaxation. An enviable location in trendy Midosuji offers it all. Just minutes’ walk from Honmachi Station, the hotel is only 10 minutes from Shinsaibashi Suji Shopping Street and a short walk to the bright neon lights of Namba and Dotonbori. This contemporary hotel is equally suited to world savvy travelers with a busy schedule or for those enjoying a leisurely getaway.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Dormy Inn Premium Osaka Kitahama Hot Springs
description: Ideally located in the Shinsaibashi area, Dormy Inn Premium Osaka Kitahama Hot Springs promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the property's facilities and services. Take advantage of the property's 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, restaurant. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find flat screen television, internet access wireless (complimentary), smoking policy non-smoking available, air conditioning, heating. Entertain yourself with the property's recreational facilities, including sauna, hot spring bath, massage. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Dormy Inn Premium Osaka Kitahama Hot Springs.priceline.com

name: Daiwa Roynet Hotel Osaka Kitahama
description: Opening in May 2013, Daiwa Roynet Hotel Osaka-Kitahama is directly connected to Kitahama Subway Station and provides modern guest rooms with free WiFi. Popular Umeda and Namba areas are both within a 15-minute subway ride. The stylish rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a wide work desk and a small fridge. An electric kettle and an air purifier are also provided. Special amenities are available for female guests. Video-on-demand services are available at a charge. Free bath amenities including tooth brushes, towels, shampoo, body wash and hair conditioners are provided. Osaka-Kitahama Daiwa Roynet Hotel offers luggage storage services and coin launderette. Internet PCs can be used at the lobby for free, and beverages can be purchased from the drinks vending machine on site. The hotel is a 20-minute walk from Osaka Castle Park. Shin-Osaka Shinkansen (bullet train) Station is a 10-minute subway ride away. Kyoto Station can be reached within a 40-minute train ride from the property. Naniwabashi Station on the Keihan-Nakanoshima Line is a 4-minute stroll from the property. A breakfast buffet with various dishes is served at the on-site Nono Budou restaurant.

name: Toyoko Inn Shin-osaka Higashi-mikuni Ekimae
description: Toyoko Inn Shin-osaka Higashi-mikuni Ekimae is conveniently located in the popular Shin Osaka area. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Toyoko Inn Shin-osaka Higashi-mikuni Ekimae. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with flat screen television, carpeting, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee, humidifier. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Osaka has to offer by making Toyoko Inn Shin-osaka Higashi-mikuni Ekimae your base.priceline.com

name: Hotel S-Presso Ebisu
description: No description found

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Temmabashi Otemae
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Osaka Castle, Toyoko Inn Osaka Temmabashi Otemae promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Toyoko Inn Osaka Temmabashi Otemae. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include massage. Discover all Osaka has to offer by making Toyoko Inn Osaka Temmabashi Otemae your base.priceline.com

name: Wellstay Namba
description: In a prime location in the Shinsaibashi, Namba, Yotsubashi district of Osaka, WELLSTAY Namba is located 800 metres from Naniwa Park, 500 metres from Motomachinaka Park and 500 metres from Shiokusa Park. With a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 300 metres from Kamomecho Park. All units are equipped with a fridge, microwave, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, and certain units at the hotel have a city view. At WELLSTAY Namba every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Namba Station, Orange Street and Nipponbashi Park. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 22 km from WELLSTAY Namba.

name: Holiday Inn Osaka Namba
description: A 1-minute walk from downtown area Dotonbori, Holiday Inn Osaka Namba offers comfortable rooms with free WiFi access. The hotel features massage services and an all-night restaurant. The hotel is a 7-minute stroll from Namba Station. A window to the en suite bathroom makes the modern rooms feel more spacious. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a refrigerator and an air humidifier. Bath amenities including a toothbrush set, slippers and hairdryers are provided. Holiday Inn Osaka Namba offers non-smoking rooms, and it provides luggage storage. Laundry services are available. Restaurant & bar Barkt serves Italian cuisine with a Japanese touch, and a wide range of beverages. The restaurant offers a terrace, as well as private dining areas. In-room dining is available. Holiday Inn Osaka Namba is a 3-minute walk from Sinsaibashi shopping area, and a 10-minute drive from Tsutenkaku Tower and Tennoji Zoo. Itami Airport is about 14 km away.

name: Harmonie Embrassee
description: Situated in Osaka, Harmonie Embrassee offers free WiFi access throughout the property. This 4-star accommodation is located just a 3-minute walk from Hankyu Umeda Station and a 10-minute walk from JR Osaka Station. Each spacious room have a modern decor with a wardrobe and flat-screen TV. Guests can find an electric kettle, refrigerator and coffee machine in all rooms. Each bathroom is equipped with a bath and shower. Guests will find bathrobes as well as a hairdryer and free toiletries. Luggage storage service is available for guest's convenience. Trouser press service is available for free. A Full English/Irish breakfast is served daily at the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant featuring French cuisine as well as an on-site cafe overlooking a garden terrace and city views. Namba Station is a 17-minute train ride away. Tsutenkaku is a 30-minute walk and train ride away. Shitennoji is 33 minutes away by walk and train from the hotel. Osaka Itami Airport is a 30-minute train ride, while Kansai International Airport is a 70-minute bus ride away from Harmonie Embrassee.

name: Sanco Inn Osaka Yodoyabashi Shikinoyu
description: Well set in the Chuo Ward district of Osaka, Sanco Inn Osaka Yodoyabashi is located 400 metres from Aramitsu Inari Daimyojin Shrine, 100 metres from Asahi Seimei Hall and 400 metres from Konko Church of Tamamizu. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 300 metres from Mitama Shrine, and within 700 metres of the city centre. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Sanco Inn Osaka Yodoyabashi every room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near Sanco Inn Osaka Yodoyabashi include Monument of Kajimaya Head House, Hongan-ji Temple Tsumura Betsuin and OSTEC Exhibition Hall. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Apa Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi
description: APA Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi is just a 2-minute walk from Tanimachi 4-Chome Subway Station and offers air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet, an LCD TV and an en suite bathroom. Rooms at Osaka-Tanimachi APA Hotel have wood furnishings and features an original mattress optimising weight distribution. Each room comes with air conditioning, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea. The private bathroom includes a bathtub and toiletries. Video-on-demand movies are available for free. Dotonbori shopping street and the lively Namba area are 20 minutes away by train. Osaka Castle is 1.6 km away.

name: Mimaru Osaka Shinsaibashi East
description: Located in the Chuo Ward district in Osaka, MIMARU OSAKA SHINSAIBASHI EAST offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Shinsaibashi Station, Shinsaibashi Shopping Arcade, and Shimoyamatobashi Monument. The property is 500 metres from Nipponbashi Monument, and within 1.1 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At MIMARU OSAKA SHINSAIBASHI EAST each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Zojugoi Yasuidoton Dobokukiko Monument, Hoan-ji Temple and Mitsutera Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 21 km from MIMARU OSAKA SHINSAIBASHI EAST.

name: Via Inn Abeno Tennoji
description: Conveniently set in the Uehommachi, Tennoji, Southern Osaka district of Osaka, Via Inn Abeno Tennoji is located 300 metres from Abeno Harukas, less than 1 km from Tokoku-ji Temple and a 8-minute walk from Horikoshi Shrine. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Kanshizume of Wells is 1.1 km from the hotel and Tsutenkaku is 1.1 km away. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Via Inn Abeno Tennoji each room includes bed linen and towels. Languages spoken at the reception include English and Japanese. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Shitennoji Koshindo Temple, Chausuyama burial mound and Isshin-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 24 km from Via Inn Abeno Tennoji.

name: Hotel Mystays Shinsaibashi
description: Hotel MyStays Shinsaibashi is located in Namba area, just a 1-minute walk from Shinsaibashi Subway Station. It is a 20-minute ride from Umeda area and 40-minute from Kyoto by train. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Air-conditioned rooms at the MyStays feature a satellite TV with video on demand (VOD), a fridge and a microwave oven. Rooms also come equipped with an electric kettle, air purifier and hairdryer. A memory foam pillow is available for guest's comfort. Guests can rent a DVD player, trouser press or iron. Other facilities include coin-operated laundry machines and internet stations. Vending machines are available in the hotel. Public parking is available nearby the hotel for an additional fee. Guests can enjoy Balinese dishes for lunch and dinner at the restaurant Ubud Suci on the ground floor. The Shinsaibashi MyStays Hotel is located just next to America Mura, and it's 12 minutes by train to Abeno Harukas (Abenobashi Terminal Building Skyscraper). It is a 25-minute drive from Osaka International Airport. Universal Studios Japan is a 20-minute train ride and Osaka Castle is a 25-minute drain ride from Shinsaibashi Station.

name: Sotetsu Fresa Inn Osaka-Namba
description: Conveniently set in the Shinsaibashi, Namba, Yotsubashi district of Osaka, Sotetsu Fresa Inn Osaka Namba is located 400 metres from Namba Station, 1.1 km from Naniwa Park and less than 1 km from Orange Street. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 300 metres from Motomachinaka Park. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Sotetsu Fresa Inn Osaka Namba each room includes bed linen and towels. Italian and American breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English, Japanese, Korean and Chinese. Popular points of interest near Sotetsu Fresa Inn Osaka Namba include Glico Man Sign, Shinsaibashi Shopping Arcade and Kamomecho Park. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Trusty Osaka Abeno
description: Hotel Trusty Osaka Abeno is just a 2-minute walk from Tennojiekimae Station and a 5-minute walk from Tennoji Station. There is free luggage storage and a 24-hour front desk available on site. Guests can make use of the free WiFi available in the rooms. All guest rooms include a private bathroom with toiletries including a hairdryer and toothbrushes. It is equipped with a bath, shower and high-tech toilet. A TV and refrigerator are included in guest rooms. A trouser press is available in all rooms. Fax and photo copying services are provided for an additional fee. There is an on-site Japanese-style teppanyaki restaurant where the chef cooks the food on an iron plate in front of guests. There is also a bar at this property that serves both alcohol and tea. Tsutenkaku, a famous tower in Osaka, is a 17-minute walk from the property. Guests can reach Dotonbori, the location of the popular Glico Man sign, in 17 minutes via train. In addition, Zepp Namba Osaka is a 16-minute train ride away.

name: Miyako City Osaka Hommachi
description: Well set in Osaka, Miyako City Osaka Hommachi provides an American breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. The property is non-smoking and is located 300 metres from Stage Ku. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Miyako City Osaka Hommachi features certain units with city views, and rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. At Miyako City Osaka Hommachi you will find a restaurant serving Chinese, international and European cuisine. A halal option can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Nanba Betsuin Temple, Namba Shrine and Shinsaibashi Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from Miyako City Osaka Hommachi.

name: Tokyu Stay Osaka Honmachi
description: Tokyu Stay Osaka Hommachi has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Osaka. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is 1.7 km from the city centre and 700 metres from Namba Shrine. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Certain rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a microwave. At Tokyu Stay Osaka Hommachi rooms include bed linen and towels. An Asian breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Tokyu Stay Osaka Hommachi include Stage Ku, TKP Shinsaibashi Ekimae Conference Center and Nanba Betsuin Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Cha Cha An
description: Located in Osaka, this welcoming vacation home brings it all within your reach. Make short work of the 6-minute drive to Dotonbori or the 4-minute drive to Tsutenkaku Tower. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Osaka by hopping on a metro at either Tengachaya North Station, a short 3-minute walk away, or Matsuda-cho Station, 5 minutes away. This 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental features a living room, a dining area, and climate-controlled air-conditioning. Enjoy the free WiFi and TV. In addition, there's a deep soaking tub, along with free toiletries, a bidet, and towels. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchenette, complete with a stovetop, a refrigerator, and a dishwasher, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter. Other amenities include bed sheets, climate-controlled heating, wardrobe or closet, and a dining table.Expedia

name: Apa Hotel & Resort Midosuji Hommachi Eki Tower
description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, APA Hotel & Resort Midosuji Hommachi Eki Tower is set in Osaka, 400 metres from Namba Shrine and 700 metres from TKP Shinsaibashi Ekimae Conference Center. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi. The property is 200 metres from Nanba Betsuin Temple, and within 1.4 km of the city centre. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at the hotel also have a city view. At APA Hotel & Resort Midosuji Hommachi Eki Tower all rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, American or Asian options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include OSTEC Exhibition Hall, Hongan-ji Temple Tsumura Betsuin and Mitama Shrine. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from APA Hotel & Resort Midosuji Hommachi Eki Tower.

name: W Osaka
description: Live it up in the dynamic heart of Osaka, Japan at W Osaka. Nestled in the fun-filled heart of Shinsaibashi, on Midosuji Boulevard, our vibrant and exciting pet-friendly hotel welcomes you to experience this fab city the W way. Reboot all your social needs amid the electric nightlife scenery of Dotonbori just around the corner. W Osaka seamlessly blends Japan’s celebrated cultural heritage with bold contemporary designs in a rarified milieu of playful chic and boundless luxury. Immerse yourself in super social, delicious dining experiences. Later, kick back in style in one of our extra-comfy hotel rooms and recharge for your next Osaka adventure.Marriott

name: Hotel Binario Umeda
description: Providing rooms with a custom pillow and free wired internet, the Hotel Binario Umeda is just a 3-minute walk from Nakatsu Subway Station and a 5-minute walk from Hankyu Umeda Train Station. A restaurant and massage service are available. Rooms at the Hotel Binario Umeda are decorated in comfortable neutral colours, and have a private bathroom with a bathtub. Each air-conditioned room includes a fridge and a flat-screen TV with video-on-demand movies. JR Osaka Train Station is only a 10-minute walk away and Umeda Sky Building is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Osaka Castle is a 30-minute train ride away, and Universal Studios Japan is 1-hour away by train.

name: Osaka Fujiya Hotel
description: Set in a prime location of Osaka, Osaka Fujiya Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park. Television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, linens, mirror, slippers can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include massage. Osaka Fujiya Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Osaka or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Liber Hotel At Universal Studios Japan
description: LIBER HOTEL AT UNIVERSAL STUDIOS JAPAN features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Osaka Bay district of Osaka. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and ticket service, along with free WiFi. The hotel has a garden and provides a terrace. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All units will provide guests with a fridge. A continental breakfast is available daily at LIBER HOTEL AT UNIVERSAL STUDIOS JAPAN. Universal Studios Japan is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Tempozan Ferris Wheel is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 22 km from LIBER HOTEL AT UNIVERSAL STUDIOS JAPAN.

name: Backpackers Hotel Toyo
description: Basic Japanese-style rooms with free Wi-Fi and shared bathrooms are on offer at Backpackers Hotel Toyo, a 2-minute walk from Dobutsuen-mae Train Station. Rental bicycles, a free-use kitchen and a coin launderette are available. Guests at Backpackers Toyo Hotel sleep in traditional Japanese futon beds on a tatami (woven-straw) floor. Some rooms have air conditioning and heating, while in others a hot water bottle is provided during winter. The hotel is a 3-minute walk from Shin-Imamiya Train Station. Tsutenkaku Tower, Osaka City Museum and Tennoji Zoo are just a 10-minute walk. The lively Dotonbori area is a 10-minute train ride away. Shower rooms are open 24/7, and the lobby has a free-use internet station. You can watch a DVD at the lounge or use the microwave to make a snack. This hotel does not serve meals.

name: Via Inn Shinsaibashi
description: Located in Shinsaibashi, Via Inn Shinsaibashi is a perfect starting point from which to explore Osaka. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, convenience store, laundromat, 24-hour front desk, newspapers are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as smoking policy non-smoking available, smoking policy smoking available. The property offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Via Inn Shinsaibashi.priceline.com

name: the b namba-kuromon
description: Well set in Osaka, the b namba-kuromon provides a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. The property is set 500 metres from Nipponbashi Catholic Church, 600 metres from Nipponbashi Park and 800 metres from Manpuku-ji Temple. The property is non-smoking and is located 400 metres from Nipponbashi Monument. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At the b namba-kuromon every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Speaking English and Japanese, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Zojugoi Yasuidoton Dobokukiko Monument, Hoan-ji Temple and Shimoyamatobashi Monument. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 22 km from the b namba-kuromon.

name: Rihga Place Higobashi
description: Conveniently located a 1-minute walk from Higobashi Subway Station, RIHGA PLACE HIGOBASHI features free WiFi, and coin launderette. Yodoyabashi, one of Osaka’s business hubs, is a 5-minute walk away. Lively Umeda and Namba areas are both within a 15-minute subway ride. JR Shin-Osaka Shinkansen (bullet train) Station is a 10-minute subway ride away. In-room facilities include a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a fridge. Guests can make a cup of tea using an electric kettle and tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a bath tub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. While staying at RIHGA PLACE HIGOBASHI, guests can request dry cleaning at an additional charge. Drink vending machines are available on site. A designated smoking area is available on site. Café Terrace serves breakfast and lunch buffets featuring Western-style dishes.

name: Unizo Inn Osaka Kitahama
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Osaka, UNIZO INN Osaka Kitahama offers American breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1.2 km from Aramitsu Inari Daimyojin Shrine, 1.1 km from Monument of Kajimaya Head House and 1.3 km from Hongan-ji Temple Tsumura Betsuin. Guests can enjoy city views. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At UNIZO INN Osaka Kitahama all rooms come with bed linen and towels. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Chinese, Japanese and European cuisine. Speaking English and Japanese at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area. Popular points of interest near UNIZO INN Osaka Kitahama include Nakanoshima Park, Asahi Seimei Hall and Mitama Shrine. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Keihan Kyobashi Grande
description: Offering modern rooms with a flat-screen TV, Hotel Keihan Kyobashi is directly connected to Keihan Kyobashi train station. It houses a shopping mall. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property. A fridge and green-tea maker are standard in all air-conditioned rooms. In-room comforts include yukatas (Japanese robes), a bathtub and hairdryer. Keihan Kyobashi Hotel is a minute’s walk from JR Kyobashi train station and an 18-minute train ride from Universal Studios Japan. It is a 15-minute walk from Osaka-jo Hall and a 15-minute drive from the Namba district. Hotel staff can provide luggage storage and dry cleaning services. Breakfast is served at Restaurant Lorraine.

name: Hotel Amaterrace Nippombashi-higashi
description: Situated within 800 metres of Namba CITY shopping mall and a 12-minute walk of Tsutenkaku, Hotel Amaterrace Nippombashi-higashi features rooms in Osaka. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Shitennoji. The property is 1 km from Shinsekai. All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a bath. The rooms will provide guests with a microwave. Glico Man Sign is 1.1 km from Hotel Amaterrace Nippombashi-higashi. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Takuto Stay Sakaisuji-Hommachi
description: No description found

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Jr Noda Ekimae
description: In a prime location in the centre of Osaka, Toyoko Inn Osaka JR Noda Ekimae provides Asian breakfast and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also provide guests with a city view. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Osaka JR Noda Ekimae include Wiste Mall, Tenjinsha Shrine and Saizen-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Welina Hotel Premier Nakanoshima East
description: Ideally set in the centre of Osaka, Welina Hotel Premier Nakanoshima EAST features free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. The property is situated 400 metres from Koyaji Temple, 1.2 km from Octopus Pine and 600 metres from TKP Osaka Yodoyabashi Conference Center. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Welina Hotel Premier Nakanoshima EAST the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Monument of Kajimaya Head House, Konko Church of Tamamizu and Aramitsu Inari Daimyojin Shrine. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 18 km from Welina Hotel Premier Nakanoshima EAST.

name: Tabist Hotel Asiato Namba
description: Stop at HOTEL ASIATO to discover the wonders of Osaka. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, laundromat, taxi service are just some of the facilities on offer. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer flat screen television, air purifier, carpeting, clothes rack, complimentary tea to ensure a restful night. The property offers various recreational opportunities. HOTEL ASIATO combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Osaka unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Sarasa Hotel Shin-Osaka
description: Well set in the Yodogawa Ward district of Osaka, SARASA HOTEL Shin-Osaka is located less than 1 km from Yamaguchi Honcho Park, a 11-minute walk from Shin-Osaka Marunouchi Building Annex and 600 metres from TKP Garden City Shin Osaka. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. At SARASA HOTEL Shin-Osaka every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English, Japanese, Korean and Chinese. Popular points of interest near SARASA HOTEL Shin-Osaka include Arde! Shin-Osaka, Eki Marche Shin-Osaka and Shin Osaka Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Apa Villa Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi 4chome-Ekimae
description: Set in a prime location of Osaka, APA Villa Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi 4Chome-Ekimae puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, laundromat, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage are just some of the facilities on offer. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, air purifier, carpeting, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms. Access to the hotel's sauna, spa, massage will further enhance your satisfying stay. For reliable service and professional staff, APA Villa Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi 4Chome-Ekimae caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Hotel Cargo Shinsaibashi
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, HOTEL Cargo Shinsaibashi offers accommodation in Osaka, 1.1 km from Glico Man Sign. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. There is a 24-inch TV in guest rooms. Towels and free toiletries including toothbrushes are included. A public bath and open-air bath are available from 15:00-03:00 (next day) at HOTEL Cargo Shinsaibashi. Bath amenities including shampoo, conditioner and make-up remover are provided for guest's convenience. A high-tech toilet and shower room are provided on each floor. Guests can reach Shinsaibashi Station in 8 minutes on foot. Kyocera Dome is about a 20-minute train ride away. Osaka Castle is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Osaka Itami Airport, 13 km from HOTEL Cargo Shinsaibashi.

name: Osaka Academia
description: Located an 12-minute walk away from Nakafuto Station, Osaka Academia boasts an array of meeting rooms of various sizes, one of which can host up to 500 guests. The hotel also features an open-air bath, public bath and sauna on site. Free on-site luggage storage is available and there is a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms come with an electric kettle, refrigerator and tea maker. En suite bathrooms are equipped with a bath and a toilet with grab rails. Free toiletries including toothbrushes, shampoo and conditioner are provided for guests. Osaka Academia is an entirely non-smoking hotel but has a designated smoking area within the accommodation. Free ironing and laundry services are provided for guest's convenience. Accessible parking and a electric vehicle charging station is also provided on site. Guests can rent bicycles at this hotel to use during their stay. The convention centre, INTEX Osaka, is just a 5-minute walk away from the hotel. Guests can go to Umeda Station via a 50-minute train ride to enjoy shopping and dining. Guests can reach Universal Studios Japan in approximately 60 minutes via train. There is a restaurant on site and breakfast can be prepared for an additional fee with a reservation in advance. A supermarket and fast-food dining options are located within a 15-minute walk from Osaka Academia.

name: Best Western Hotel Fino Osaka Shinsaibashi
description: Discover the dynamism of Japan's second largest city from the comfort of Best Western Hotel Fino Osaka Shinsaibashi. Following the completion of a renovation project, the hotel now features a modernized lobby area and revitalized guest rooms, which are well-equipped with flat-screen TVs, working desks and complimentary Wi-Fi. Corporate travelers can take advantage of a range of professional services at the hotel's business center. Located in the downtown area, this midscale hotel is close to City Hall and the renowned shopping and dining area of Shinsabishi-suji. Whether you’re visiting Osaka for business or leisure, Best Western Hotel Fino Osaka Shinsaibashi is a great option in the heart of the action.bestwestern.com

name: Takuto Hotel Osaka Shinsaibashi
description: No description found

name: Rakuten Stay Osaka Station North
description: About 10 minutes on foot from Osaka Station or Umeda Station / About 2 minutes on foot from Shin-Umeda City A French bed mattress for a good night's sleep in a room that makes you forget the hustle and bustle of the city. A ceiling light with a projector that won't get bored even if you stay for a long time "PopIn Aladdin" is installed in all guest rooms. [Characteristics of this facility] ・Safety of “non-contact” and “non-face-to-face” with unmanned operation ・Reliable security with a key number for each customer and peace of mind with bank-level security cameras ・Entirely non-smoking in the guest room (there is a smoking booth in the hotel) ・There is no daily room cleaning during consecutive nights, so you can spend your time without worrying about time. ・The entrance is equipped with a slope. Easy to move around even with a suitcase♪Rakuten

name: Smile Hotel Premium Osaka Hommachi
description: Open from December 2017, Smile Hotel Premium Osaka Hommachi offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Shinsaibashi Station is a 9-minute walk away. The property is around 1 km from Glico Man Sign, 1.5 km from Namba CITY shopping mall and 2.2 km from Osaka Castle. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with a desk, a TV and a private bathroom. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at Smile Hotel Premium Osaka Hommachi can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking English and Japanese, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Shitennoji is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Tsutenkaku is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Osaka Itami Airport, 13 km from Smile Hotel Premium Osaka Hommachi.

name: Candeo Hotels Osaka Namba
description: This 4-star hotel is located in Central Osaka and includes a mineral bath. It offers free Wi-Fi, a sauna and a 24-hour reception. A dry cleaning service, luggage storage and a laundry service are just some of the convenient services at Candeo Hotels Osaka Namba. The in-house spa offers a chance to get pampered and relax. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a refrigerator and a private bathroom. All provide blackout curtains, a flat-screen TV and heating. Osaka's attractions, such as Shinsaibashi, Dotonbori and Dotonbori Tsuribori, are easily accessible on foot from Candeo Hotels Osaka Namba. Guests can also find lots of restaurants and shops nearby.Revato

name: Guesthouse Jakotel Namba
description: No description found

name: Enzo Shin-Osaka C
description: Set in Osaka, near Water Service Memorial Museum, Yamaguchi Honcho Park and Souzenji Temple, Enzo Shin-Osaka C features free WiFi. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Settsu Prefectural Government Office Site, Hinode Minami Park and Shin-Osaka Marunouchi Building Annex. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 16 km from Enzo Shin-Osaka C.

name: Hotel Livemax Shinsaibashi East
description: HOTEL LiVEMAX Shinsaibashi East features air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV in the Chuo Ward district of Osaka. The property is located 800 metres from Nipponbashi Monument, 800 metres from Zojugoi Yasuidoton Dobokukiko Monument and 1.1 km from Mitsutera Temple. The property is 2.3 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Stage Ku. All units will provide guests with a microwave. Popular points of interest near the hotel include TKP Shinsaibashi Ekimae Conference Center, Shinsaibashi Station and Namba Shrine. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 21 km from HOTEL LiVEMAX Shinsaibashi East.

name: Shin Osaka Washington Hotel Plaza
description: Conveniently situated a 5-minute walk from Shin Osaka Shinkansen (Bullet Train) Station, Washington Hotel Plaza offers simple guest rooms with free wired internet. Overlooking the city, two restaurants on the 23rd floor offer delicious Japanese and Chinese cuisine. The air-conditioned rooms are fitted with an LCD TV with video-on-demand programmes, a small fridge and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests at Shin Osaka Washington Hotel Plaza can unwind with a massage in their room, or enjoy a workout at the gym. The front desk is open 24/7, offering luggage storage services. Japanese restaurant Ginza serves signature shabu-shabu dishes and other local meals, while China Table offers gourmet Chinese and gorgeous city views. A hearty breakfast buffet can be enjoyed at China Table on the 23rd floor. The hotel is within a 30-minute train ride from both Kaiyukan Aquarium, which houses a whale shark, and Universal Studios Japan. The popular Umeda area is a 10-minute train ride away. Kyoto can be reached within a 30-minute train ride from the hotel.

name: Hotel Public Jam
description: Hotel Public Jam is a hotel located in Osaka, 1.4 km from Shitennoji and 1.8 km from Namba CITY shopping mall. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. The rooms include a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom fitted with a bath. Extras include bath robes, slippers and a hair dryer. Glico Man Sign is 1.8 km from Hotel Public Jam, while Tsutenkaku is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Osaka Itami Airport, 15 km from Hotel Public Jam.

name: Namba Oriental Hotel
description: Only a 3-minute stroll from Namba Subway Station on the Nankai Line, Namba Oriental Hotel is situated in the heart of Osaka's entertainment, dining and shopping district. The hotel features a patio, restaurants and massages. Rooms are air conditioned and free WiFi is provided. Rooms at Namba Oriental Hotel are furnished with an LCD TV with satellite channels and sightseeing information/local maps search functions. Each room includes an air humidifier, a mini fridge, nightwear and slippers. Rooms also include an electric kettle and green tea bags. Facilities include an ATM and a launderette. Shops and 13 restaurants can be found on the hotel grounds. Located in Osaka’s main downtown area, Namba Oriental Hotel is close to many shops and restaurants. The Dotonbori area is just a 5-minute walk, and the Shinsaibashi area is a 15-minute walk away. Kansai International Airport can be reached via a 50-minute train ride.

name: Hotel Livemax Umeda West
description: Conveniently located in Osaka, HOTEL LiVEMAX Umeda WEST offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Taiyū-ji Temple is 400 metres away and Nozaki Park is 500 metres from the hotel. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a TV. Popular points of interest near HOTEL LiVEMAX Umeda WEST include Honden-ji Temple, Hokai-ji Temple and Hosei-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.1
description: The 2.5-star Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.1 offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Osaka. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, newspapers, dry cleaning. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including massage. Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.1 combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Osaka unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Hearton Hotel Shinsaibashi
description: Just a 2-minute walk from Exit 7 of Shinsaibashi Subway Station and located right by America Village, Hearton Hotel offers cosy rooms with free wired internet access. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The popular Dotonbori and Namba area are only a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Shinsaibashi Hearton Hotel is a 15-minute train ride from Osaka Castle. Shin Osaka Train Station is a 20-minute train ride away, and Kansai International Airport is about an hour away by train, limousine bus or taxi. The simple yet comfortable rooms at Hearton Hotel Shinsaibashi have a relaxed decor and include a private bathroom. Guests can relax with a cup of tea and enjoy watching the flat-screen satellite TV. A humidifier and trouser press can be borrowed for in-room use. The convenient 24-hour front desk provides luggage storage and safety deposit. Laundry and dry-cleaning services are also on offer. Umbrellas can be borrowed on rainy days. The stylish Cafe Planet 3rd offers a breakfast buffet.

name: Hotel Monterey La Soeur Osaka
description: Hotel Monterey Lasoeur Osaka is situated in Osaka Business Park, next to Panasonic Centre. It offers modern accommodation with a spa, a restaurant and free Wi-Fi. It's a 5-minute walk from Kyobashi Train Station, which connects to downtown Osaka in 6 minutes and to Kyoto in 40 minutes. Famous cherry blossom viewing spots like Osaka Castle Park and Japan Mint are both within a 15-minute walk away. Decorated in an art-deco style, rooms feature rich colours and wooden flooring. Each room is equipped with a work desk and a flat-screen TV. Guests can relax at Trinite Natural Hot Springs Spa at a charge, unwinding in a hot tub, sauna and open-air bath. Laundry and ironing services are available. Restaurant Escale serves French cuisine in an elegant setting. Zuientei offers Japanese dishes. A Chinese restaurant is also located within the hotel. Lasoeur Osaka is 500 metres from Osaka Business Park Subway Station and about 1.5 km from Osaka Castle. Hokoku Shrine is about a 20-minute walk away.

name: Via Inn Shin Osaka West
description: Attractively set in the Yodogawa Ward district of Osaka, Via Inn Shin Osaka West is situated 200 metres from TKP Garden City Shin Osaka, less than 1 km from Arde! Shin-Osaka and a 8-minute walk from Eki Marche Shin-Osaka. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Hinode Park is less than 1 km from the hotel and Shin-Osaka Marunouchi Building Annex is a 12-minute walk away. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. At Via Inn Shin Osaka West rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. An Asian breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Speaking both English and Japanese, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near Via Inn Shin Osaka West include Shin Osaka Station, TKP Shin Osaka Ekimae Conference Centre and Hinode Minami Park. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Namba Nippombashi
description: Stop at Toyoko Inn Osaka Namba Nippombashi to discover the wonders of Osaka. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, laundry service, dry cleaning are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as massage. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Osaka, Toyoko Inn Osaka Namba Nippombashi will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Daiwa Roynet Hotel Osaka Uehonmachi
description: Only a 1-minute walk from Osaka-Uehonmachi Train Station, Daiwa Roynet Hotel Osaka-Uehonmachi offers modern accommodations featuring a flat-screen TV with VOD channels. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property and laptop rentals are provided at the 24-hour front desk. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a trouser press and a desk. A humidifier and Japanese Yukata robes are provided as well. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toothbrush sets. A coin-launderette is on site and guests can request for relaxing massages for an extra cost. Dry cleaning and photocopying services are provided at the front desk. A free-use internet PC is located at the lobby. Osaka-Uehonmachi Daiwa Roynet Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Tanimachi Kyuchome Subway Station and a 15-minute train ride from Namba Station. Kansai International Airport is a 50-minute ride and Itami Airport is a 30-minute ride away from Osaka-Uehonmachi Train Station on the limousine bus.

name: Sakuragawa Riverside Hotel
description: Attractively set in the Shinsaibashi, Namba, Yotsubashi district of Osaka, Sakuragawa River Side Hotel is situated 500 metres from Manpuku-ji Temple, 800 metres from Motomachinaka Park and less than 1 km from Glico Man Sign. The property is located less than 1 km from Mitsutera Temple, a 12-minute walk from Naniwa Park and 600 metres from Minatomachi River Place Convention Centre. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 6-minute walk from Orange Street. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms come with a river view. At Sakuragawa River Side Hotel rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kokoni Sunaba Ariki Monument, Wakoji Temple and Amida Pond. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 21 km from Sakuragawa River Side Hotel.

name: Apa Hotel Osaka Tenma
description: APA Hotel Osaka-Temma is located on Temmabashi Suji Street, and a 6-minute walk from JR Temma Station and 7-minute walk from JR Sakuranomiya Station. Ogimachi Subway Station is an 8-minute walk away. It boasts public baths, a sauna and a restaurant. The guestrooms are well equipped with free wired internet access. Featuring an original mattress optimising weight distribution, the rooms are well equipped with a flat-screen TV, heating and air conditioning facilities, as well as, a work desk. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub, a hairdryer and toiletries. APA Hotel Osaka-Temma is 10 minutes by car from Osaka Castle, while Nakanoshima Park is a 20-minute drive away. The hotel provides a Japanese and Western and Indian buffet style breakfast daily. There are vending machines on site. Other facilities include massage chairs, laundry and dry cleaning services, and luggage storage at the 24-hour front desk.

name: Business Hotel Nissei
description: Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, a 24-hour front desk and massages, Business Hotel Nissei is a 7-minute walk from the lively Dotonbori street and a 3-minute walk from Namba Train Station. Rooms at Hotel Nissei are air-conditioned and simply furnished, with a satellite LCD TV, a desk and a fridge. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub. Green tea and a Yukata robe are provided. Nipponbashi Subway Station is 350 metres away, and the Shinsekai neighbourhood is a 7-minute walk from the hotel. Tsutenkaku Tower is about a 15-minute walk. Two free-use internet PCs are provided at the hotel’s “business room.” Luggage can be left at the front desk. Breakfast sets are served at the dining area from 06:30-09:30. Other meals are not served.

name: Hotel S-Presso Namba
description: Located a short stroll from Osaka Namba Train Station, Hotel-Spresso provides guests with a convenient base when in Osaka. It also provides a safe, a designated smoking area and free Wi-Fi. The rooms are air conditioned and include a coffee maker and a refrigerator. After settling in to their room, guests can explore the local area with use of Namba Train Station, which is a brief stroll from the hotel. Osaka's attractions, such as Nipponbashi and the Nihon Kogeikan, are within easy walking distance of Hotel-Spresso. Osaka City Air Terminal, Dotonbori and Dotonbori Tsuribori are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Hotel Mystays Shin Osaka Conference Center
description: Located only 500 metres from Central Exit of JR Shin-Osaka Shinkansen Station, Hotel Mystays Shin Osaka Conference Center provides rooms with free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk offering luggage storage. Rivage Restaurant serves Japanese and Western dishes all day, including a breakfast buffet. Rooms at Hotel Mystays Shin Osaka Conference Center are air-conditioned, with a wood desk and a comfortable beige decor. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub and amenities, toothbrushes and a hairdryer. Extras include an electric kettle with tea set, air purifier and memory foam pillows. The flat-screen TV offers video-on-demand movies. Massage service is offered upon request with fees. A coin launderette is on site including trouser press rentals. Banquet and meeting rooms are available on site. Sozen-ji Temple is 1.5 km away, and Osaka Castle is a 20-minute drive. Nishi-Nakajima Minamikata Subway Station is a 5-minute walk, from which Umeda Station is a 6-minute ride.

name: Red Roof Inn & Suites Osaka - Namba/Nippombashi
description: Ideally situated in the Chuo Ward district of Osaka, Red Roof Inn & Suites Osaka Namba Nipponbashi is situated 300 metres from Nipponbashi Park, 600 metres from Manpuku-ji Temple and 600 metres from Shinsengumi Osaka Tonsho Monument. This 2-star motel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is 300 metres from Nipponbashi Catholic Church, and within 600 metres of the city centre. The motel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Popular points of interest near Red Roof Inn & Suites Osaka Namba Nipponbashi include Daikaku-ji Temple, Komyo-ji Temple and Shinko-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Monterey Le Frere Osaka
description: Located in Osaka, 300 metres from Kitanosaurus, Hotel Monterey Le Frere Osaka provides accommodation with a restaurant and private parking. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel features a sauna, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Hotel Monterey Le Frere Osaka every room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sonezaki Ebisu Shrine, Hokai-ji Temple and Hosei-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 18 km from Hotel Monterey Le Frere Osaka.

name: ibis Budget Osaka Umeda
description: Ibis budget Osaka Umeda is located at the heart of Umeda, one of Osaka's major business and entertainment districts. It is within 10 min by foot from JR Osaka and Umeda Station, near the shopping and nightlife venues. The hotel offers easy access to all m ajor tourist attractions, including Universal Studios Japan and Osaka Castle.accorhotels.com

name: Apa Hotel Shin-Osaka-Ekiminami
description: APA Hotel Shin-Osaka-Ekiminami is situated in Osaka. With free WiFi, hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is just a 3-minute walk from exit 7 of Shin-Osaka Station subway and a 6-minute walk from JR Shin-Osaka exit. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with centrally-controlled air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each room includes an original mattress optimising weight distribution and a private bathroom with a bath. There is a socket near the bed. Free luggage storage is available for guests. Vending machines for food and drink is available, including a microwave on the ground floor. The on-site restaurant offers Japanese and Western buffet breakfast every morning at the property. Billboard Live Osaka is 3.5 km from APA Hotel Shin-Osaka-Ekiminami, while Osaka Castle is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Hotel Bali Tower Osaka Tennoji
description: Located only a five-minute walk from Tennoji Train Station, Hotel Bali Tower Osaka Tennoji offers guests a convenient base when in Osaka. It also offers complimentary wireless internet. There are a range of amenities at the hotel that guests can enjoy, such as a coffee bar, meeting rooms and a gym. It also provides a shopping mall, room service and a designated smoking area. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a Blu-ray player, a refrigerator and a shower. They are also equipped with heating and a hair dryer. Hotel Bali Tower Osaka Tennoji offers a conveniently located café where guests can have a bite to eat before exploring the area. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. The hotel is close to Osaka's well-known attractions, with Abeno Cues Town and Shitenno-ji Temple just a 10-minute walk away. Tennoji Park, Isshin-ji Temple and Tennoji Zoo are each within walking distance.Revato

name: SureStay Plus Hotel by Best Western Shin-Osaka
description: Our restaurant is temporarily closed and breakfast suspended until further notice. SureStay Plus by Best Western Shin-Osaka is a stylish new midscale hotel which keeps guests well-connected in downtown Osaka. Perfectly located close to Shin-Osaka Station, guests can easily access the Osaka Metro and rail networks, including Shinkansen bullet train services. This puts the entire city, the thriving Kansai region and the rest of Japan within easy reach. The hotel features 108 modern guestrooms, all equipped with comfortable beds and convenient amenities, including complimentary Wi-Fi. Every morning, guests can start their day with an energizing buffet breakfast. SureStay Plus by Best Western Shin-Osaka becomes the first SureStay in Japan, marking the start of a new era of smart, contemporary and value-for-money accommodation.bestwestern.com

name: Doyanen Hotels Yamato
description: No description found

name: My Dear - Adults Only
description: Set in Osaka, 700 metres from Kamitsu Shrine, My DearⅠ offers air-conditioned rooms and a shared lounge. The property is around 1.8 km from Namban Culture Center, 2 km from Eisho-ji Temple and 2 km from Glico Museum. Free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk are featured. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near My DearⅠ include Tsukamoto Shrine, Zenkyuji Temple and Tsukamoto Station Shopping Street. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Fine Aroma Dotonbori
description: Fine Aroma Dotonbori (Adult Only) is a love hotel located just a 1-minute walk from the lively Dotonbori area and a 3-minute walk from Nipponbashi Subway Station. The accommodation offers modern air-conditioned rooms with an LCD TV and a minibar. Free WiFi is available at the entire property. The mood-lit rooms at Fine Aroma Dotonbori (Adult Only) include a fridge, an electric kettle with green tea and a seating area, many of which have a sofa. En suite shower/bath and toilet facilities are provided in each room. Rooms have erotic items and TV channels, and all rooms allow smoking. The hotel is about a 10-minute walk from Kintetsu Namba Train Station and a 30-minute train trip from Osaka Castle. Ikukunitama Shrine is 1 km away. The 24-hour front desk can store luggage for guests, and lends out aroma diffusers, curling irons, ironing facilities and more. Room service can be ordered, including an in-room breakfast.

name: Hostel Ko-Fu
description: No description found

name: Sotetsu Grand Fresa Osaka - Namba
description: Opened in April 2016, Sotetsu Grand Fresa Osaka-Namba features free WiFi throughout the entire property and an on-site restaurant. The hotel is situated within a 2-minute walk from Nippombashi Station on the Kintetsu, Sakaisuji and Sennichimae Subway lines. The popular Dotonbori and Tsutenkaku areas as well as Osaka Castle are a 10-minute train ride away. Every room is fitted with a TV. You will find a kettle in the room. The rooms come with a private bathroom equipped with a bath. Extras include slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Glico Man Sign is 500 metres from Sotetsu Grand Fresa Osaka-Namba, while Namba CITY shopping mall is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Osaka Itami Airport, 14 km from Sotetsu Grand Fresa Osaka-Namba.

name: Oriental Hotel Universal City
description: Attractively situated in the Osaka Bay district of Osaka, ORIENTAL HOTEL UNIVERSAL CITY is situated 1.9 km from Universal Studios Japan, 5 km from Minato Kumin Centre and 5.1 km from Isoji Central Park. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. The rooms in ORIENTAL HOTEL UNIVERSAL CITY are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Staff at the accommodation are available to provide advice at the 24-hour front desk. Wiste Mall is 5.2 km from ORIENTAL HOTEL UNIVERSAL CITY, while Tempozan Ferris Wheel is 5.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: The Lively Osaka Honmachi
description: The Lively Osaka Honmachi has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Osaka. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from Stage Ku, and within 1.7 km of the city centre. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. You can play billiards at the hotel, and bike hire is available. Popular points of interest near The Lively Osaka Honmachi include Nanba Betsuin Temple, Namba Shrine and Nakanoshima Park. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel MyStays Otemae
description: Hotel Mystays Otemae is conveniently located 1 km from Osaka Business Park. The hotel features modern apartments with kitchenettes and free WiFi access throughout. Tanimachiyonchome Station and Temmabashi Station are just a 5-minute walk from the hotel All of Hotel Mystays's spacious air-conditioned apartments come with VCRs, video-on-demand movies and both seating and dining areas. An air purifier and nightwear are provided. Private bathrooms are furnished with high-tech toilets, toothbrushes and bath amenities. Coin-operated laundry machines and internet stations are provided at the hotel. Trouser press and ironing rentals are available. Numerous convenience stores and restaurants are available within a 10-minute walk. Universal Studios Japan is a 30-minute drive away, while the property is a 15-minute walk from Osaka Castle. The Umeda area and Shinsaibashi-Suji Street are a 20-minute train ride away. The nearest airport is Kansai International Airport, a 70-minute train ride and walk away from Hotel Mystays Otemae.

name: My Dear II - Adults Only
description: Set in Osaka, 600 metres from Kamitsu Shrine, My DearⅡ offers air-conditioned accommodation and a shared lounge. The property is around 1.8 km from Namban Culture Center, 2.1 km from Eisho-ji Temple and 1.9 km from Glico Museum. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near My DearⅡ include Tsukamoto Shrine, Zenkyuji Temple and Tsukamoto Station Shopping Street. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Osaka Tokyu Rei Hotel
description: Osaka Tokyu REI Hotel is located a 10-minute walk from JR Osaka Train Station and Umeda Subway Station. The hotel offers modern accommodation, flat-screen TVs, free internet access and a cafe. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property. The air-conditioned guestrooms at Tokyu REI Osaka Hotel are equipped with a fridge and a hairdryer. En suite bathrooms come with bath amenities and a bathtub. Umeda Sky Building is a 20-minute walk away, and the hotel is a 30-minute train ride to Universal Studios Japan. Shin-Osaka Train Station is a 15-minute train ride away. Osaka Tokyu REI Hotel features a self-service laundry area and massage services. A daily breakfast buffet is available at Little Monster.

name: Rozy Hotel Namba
description: Rozy Hotel Namba is a popular choice amongst travelers in Osaka, whether exploring or just passing through. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, elevator. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, clothes rack, linens, slippers. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes Rozy Hotel Namba the perfect choice for your stay in Osaka.Agoda

name: City Plaza Osaka
description: City Plaza Osaka features a free-use rooftop spa with open-air baths and massage chairs. It offers cosy accommodation with free internet access a 6-minute walk from Sakaisuji Honmachi Subway Station. Rooms at Osaka City Plaza feature a calm decor with bold splashes of colour. Each includes an electric kettle and en suite bathroom, and guests can relax after a long day by watching the satellite flat-screen TV. Osaka Castle is about a 15-minute walk from the hotel, and Dotonbori shopping street and Osaka International Convention Centre are a 10-minute taxi ride away. Guests can take a dip in the heated indoor pool, de-stress in the City Plaza’s sauna, or work out in the fitness room on the 13th floor. These facilities are accessible at an extra charge. Japanese specialities are available at the elegant Ooe Restaurant. Other dining options include relaxed buffet restaurant Rivage and 14th-floor Tatsumiya Japanese Restaurant.

name: Hotel Sunplaza 2 Annex
description: Open in September 2015, Hotel Sunplaza 2 Annex is only a 2-minnute walk from Shin Imamiya Station of the JR and Nankai Railway. Dobutsuen-mae Subway Station exit 6 is a 2-minute walk away. Guestrooms are air-conditioned and offer free WiFi access and a refrigerator. Guestrooms come equipped with free toiletries including face towels and tooth brushes. Bathrooms, shower booths and toilets are shared with other guests. The shared bathroom and shower booths offer free toiletries including body soap, shampoo and hair conditioning. There is a mixed powder room for male and female guests, as well as a female-only powder room on site. Hairdryers are available in the powder room.

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.2
description: Attractively set in the Osaka Station, Umeda, Yodoyabashi, Hommachi district of Osaka, Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.2 is situated 700 metres from Tomishima Shrine, 700 metres from Catholic Osaka Umeda Church and less than 1 km from Nakatsu Shopping Street. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is 2.3 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Toyosaki Shrine. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. At Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.2 guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tsunashikiten Shrine Otabisha, Eisho-ji Temple and Seibi Park. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.2.

name: Comfort Self Hotel First Breath
description: No description found

name: Tanimachi Luxe Hotel
description: Tanimachi LUXE HOTEL is a non-smoking accommodation set in Osaka, 1.1 km from Namba CITY shopping mall and 1.2 km from Glico Man Sign. Conveniently set in the Uehommachi, Tennoji, Southern Osaka district, the property is situated a 15-minute walk from Shitennoji and a 20-minute walk from Tsutenkaku. Free WiFi is available. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Staff are always available to help at the reception. Shinsekai is 1.7 km from Tanimachi LUXE HOTEL, while Osaka Castle is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Osaka Itami Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Dotonbori Crystal Hotel II
description: Ideally set in the centre of Osaka, Doutonbori Crystal Hotel Ⅱ is within 300 metres of Shimoyamatobashi Monument and 600 metres of Nipponbashi Monument. Featuring a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. At Doutonbori Crystal Hotel Ⅱ the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Popular points of interest near Doutonbori Crystal Hotel Ⅱ include Zojugoi Yasuidoton Dobokukiko Monument, Hoan-ji Temple and Manpuku-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Apa Villa Hotel Yodoyabashi
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Umeda, APA Villa Hotel Yodoyabashi promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, laundromat, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, linens, towels, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary). Access to the hotel's sauna, hot spring bath, spa, massage will further enhance your satisfying stay. Discover all Osaka has to offer by making APA Villa Hotel Yodoyabashi your base.priceline.com

name: Dormy Inn Premium Namba Natural Hot Spring
description: Located a 5-minute walk away from Nihonbashi Train Station, Dormy Inn Premium Namba Natural Hot Spring offers modern accommodations with Wi-Fi. Relaxing massages are available for an extra cost and guests can refresh in the public hot-spring baths. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Sauna rooms are located by the hot-spring baths and guests can use the coin-launderette on-site. Dry cleaning and photocopying services are available at the front desk. Luggage storage is offered as well. A Western breakfast buffet is served at the restaurant. Namba Dormy Inn Premium Natural Hot Spring is a 5-minute walk away from Dotonbori and from Denden Town. The Shinsaibashi shopping area is within a 15-minute walk from the property.

name: Hotel Livemax Budget Shinosaka
description: Only 400 metres from JR Shin-Osaka Shinkansen Station, HOTEL LiVEMAX新大阪 offers air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom, microwave and flat-screen TV. A coin launderette is on site. Free WiFi is provided in all rooms. All simply furnished rooms at Livemax Shin Osaka have an electric kettle and a small desk. A yukata robe is provided. The attached bathroom includes a bathtub and amenities. Dotonbori Shopping Street is just a 15-minute subway ride from nearby Shin-Osaka Station. Sozen-ji Temple is 1 km away. Osaka Castle is 7 km away, about a 20-minute drive.

name: Y's Hotel Shin Osaka
description: Open in November 2017, Y's HOTEL Shin Osaka offers accommodation in Osaka. This property is located an 8-minute walk from Shin-Osaka Station. Free WiFi is available in all areas. All rooms feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and refrigerator. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, slippers, towels and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk and free luggage storage at the property. A drinks vending machine is available on site. Guests can relax in the public bath. Guests can reach Umeda Sky Building in 25 minutes by train and Osaka Castle in 15 minutes by train. Glico Man Sign is a 25-minute train ride away. The nearest airport is Osaka Itami Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Smile Hotel Premium Osaka Higashi Shinsaibashi
description: Ideally set in the centre of Osaka, Smile Hotel Premium Osaka Higashishinsaibashi features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is close to popular attractions like Zojugoi Yasuidoton Dobokukiko Monument, Mitsutera Temple and Glico Man Sign. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Smile Hotel Premium Osaka Higashishinsaibashi the rooms come with bed linen and towels. American and Asian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Smile Hotel Premium Osaka Higashishinsaibashi include Hoan-ji Temple, Shimoyamatobashi Monument and Nipponbashi Monument. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 22 km from the hotel.
